content: संभाष् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} ({%a%}) To speak together, converse; <ls>Ms. 8. 55.</ls> ({%b%}) To say or speak in general. {@--2@} To speak to, address. {@--3@} To greet, salute. {@--4@} To agree together, consent. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To converse with. {@--2@} To persuade, prevail upon.
